alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 7:27PM EDT until August 10 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Greensville County in southeastern Virginia... Southwestern Southampton County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seaboard, or near Garysburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Seaboard around 735 PM EDT. Boykins around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mud Castle, Milwaukee, Pendleton, Bryants Corner, Jackson, Boones Crossroads, Pleasant Grove, Severn, Margarettsville and Creeksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
